title: Is the Covid vaccine safe long term?
cleaned_text:
When you look at the safety of the covid vaccine it’s pretty amazing that there have been no serious side effects. There have been millions of people that have already been vaccinated across the country. This vaccine is amazing and remarkably safe. The vaccine works to stop the hospitalization and death caused by the virus.

Is this vaccine is going to affect their health and somehow cause serious medical problems long term?

The problem is that people fear the vaccine is going to affect their health and somehow cause serious medical problems, but Dr. Angus a well-known doctor has said that if you look historically with every vaccine they’ve done the side effects are all seen in the first month or so we.

If you don’t see other side effects the vaccine is gone. Your immune response happened. You’re not going to see side effects six months and a year do down the road.

The problems and permanent damage this virus can leave are far worse than the shot.
